      • buildPageInfo

        protected PageInfo buildPageInfo(java.lang.Long count,
                                 java.lang.Long currentPage,
                                 java.lang.Long countPerPage,
                                 java.lang.Integer displayDistance)
        Build a page html content according to number of records, records per page, base URL and display distance.

        Example: Get total and set it into buildPageInfo method:
        PageInfo pageInfo = buildPageInfo(articleDAO.count(), RECORD_PER_PAGE, getContextPath("") + "/Problem", null);

        Parameters:
        count - total number of records
        currentPage - current page number
        countPerPage - number of records per page
        displayDistance - display distance for page numbers
        Returns:
        return a PageInfo object and put the HTML content into request attribute list.
